sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import styled from "styled-components" import { calender, comment, dollar, trash } from "../../utils/icons" import Button from "../Buttons/Button" function IncomeItem({ id, title, amount, date, category, description, deleteItem, indicatorItem, type, }) { return (
{title}

{dollar} 45

{calender} {date}{" "}

{comment} {description}

) } const IncomeItemStyled = styled.div` background: #FCF6F9 border: 2px solid #FFFFFF box-shadow: 0px 1px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06) border-radius: 20px padding: 1rem margin-bottom: 1rem display: flex align-items: center gap: 1rem width: 100% color: #222260 .icon{ width: 80px height: 80px background: #FFFFFF display: flex align-items: center justify-content: center border: 2px solid #FFFFFF i{ font-size: 2.6rem } } .content{ flex: 1 display: flex flex-direction: column gap: .2rem h5{ font-size: 1.3rem padding-left: 2rem position: relative &::before{ content: "" position: absolute left: 0 top: 50% transform: translateY(-50%) width: .8rem height: .8rem border-radius: 50% } } } ` export default IncomeItem
